summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 9.2°C) and outside temperature (down 9.0°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 22 miles) and cloud levels (up 178 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; prepare for cold, chilly weather ahead. Also, the air will feel dry and gentle light winds are expected. Chance of light rain, low clouds are expected, possibly some fog or persistent clouds, and the light is absent. The weather will likely remain the same.
